entry.title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning
entry.content: 🎥 Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning, 2025 ⭐️ ★★★½ Even as a standalone, this would’ve been a smash hit. The action is spectacular, the locations are stunning, and the set pieces are jaw-dropping. There’s strategy, suspense, and jus... 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/mission-impossible-the-final-reckoning/ #FilmReview

entry.title: The Three Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Three Musketeers, 1973 ⭐️ ★★★½ Richard Lester’s take stands out for its sense of fun and camaraderie. The first part leans heavily on action, and while not all the fight sequences are particularly well executed.
